CONCERNS: Size & Number of Speaker Array
PDT_DISC_CONC: As the number of speakers increase, so will the construction and maintenance cost. Strive for modular design; redundancy
PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT: initial indication is the number of speakers can be reduced;
PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY: Continued R&D; re-evaluate BR acoustics cross walked with data collected at Lock 19 for improvements;
ACTION_ITEMS: Finish R&D, Design Charrettes, and preliminary design

CONCERNS: Noise on barges
PDT_DISC_CONC: Acoustic barrier can potentially resonate in the empty barges due to hollow hulls creating nuisance.
PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT: Could interfere with communications between deckhands and captains; empty barges becoming an amplifier of the sound; may lose efficacy of deterrent system if volume levels must be lowered; impacts to public use of the adjacent area
PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY: Continued R&D; collect data; evaluate affects on actual navigation vessels at Lock 19;
ACTION_ITEMS: Finish R&D, Design Charrettes, and preliminary design

CONCERNS: Single source for speakers, sole proprietor
PDT_DISC_CONC: Single source production rate is very limited; sole source procurement required;
PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT: If we need to change to another source there will be an impact to design when it comes to housing size, channel layout/recesses etc.; pulse acoustic technologies;
PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY: conduct a sources sought of other speakers; development salient characteristics specifications;  laboratory testing of other systems; sources sought on salient conditions desired
ACTION_ITEMS: Finish R&D, Design Charrettes, and preliminary design

CONCERNS: Interaction with Bubble Curtain
PDT_DISC_CONC: Don't know the effects air bubbles will have on sound
PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT: acoustic barrier performance may be diminished by bubble curtain;. Air normally effects sound propagation in water; two technologies combined have not included fish response; operational cost of air compressors at L19 in conjunction with acoustic testing
PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY: Testing at Lock 19 with air bubble curtain on can be done to collect data; look at other sites testing bubble curtains (Barkley, Peoria); look at funding OD for additional air compressor costs at testing sites
ACTION_ITEMS: Finish R&D, Design Charrettes, and preliminary design

CONCERNS: Operability, maintainability, sustainability
PDT_DISC_CONC: Acoustic system has not been tested for 25 or 50 yr. operation
PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT: Unknown until measured; increased maintenance and/or repair/replacement
PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY: Test speakers for an extended period of time;  measure the success (durability and any degradation) at Locks 19 & 6;
ACTION_ITEMS: Finish R&D, Design Charrettes, and preliminary design

CONCERNS: Right descending bank may not be available for use

CONCERNS: Efficacy of Acoustics
PDT_DISC_CONC: Limited systems are being tested. One system is patented so we do not have the ability to test. Do we have the right system? Are fish responsive to the systems being tested in the field? We need to maintain at appropriate levels that do not disrupt navigation and local residence. Is it sustainable?
PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT: If it's not affective, may need to abandon concept for another deterrent system; R&D will take several years to reach conclusions; durability; sediment
PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY: Continued R&D; MVR support of testing at L&D 19 test site

RISK_OPPORTUNITY_EVENT: A Phase II Environmental Site Investigation of the site is required and could not be obtained during the feasibility study.
CONCERNS: The assumption made during the feasibility study was the site could be used for construction with some remediation. Environmental site investigation may result in unusable site or high cost.
AE would not have capacity or execute in time
The type of contract, Design/Build or Design/Bid/Build, can affect timeline and cost.
Larger contracts may be broken into multiple contracts.
Systems need to be packaged to meet their intended functions and warranties can be enforced.
All contracts are assumed to be unrestricted (full and open). If this assumption is incorrect, costs will be higher.
Illinois has concerns with the current PPA template. Concerns that the PPA can't be negotiated and can't be negotiated on time.
ACTION_ITEMS: 7/30 Elevating the issue to HQ

RISK_OPPORTUNITY_EVENT: Operation of Flushing Lock in Combination with Hydro Power Study
CONCERNS: Balance of water between hydro power and flushing lock may be difficult.
PDT_DISC_CONC: USACE controls the water supply and would govern availbility to any developed hydropower ventures

CONCERNS: What are we designing towards?  Operations of barriers, time of flushing, etc.…  Need to establish a baseline to measure against 15 min delay time was a study assumption. The time may not be accurate and the barriers may not be as effective as in the feasbility report.
PDT_DISC_CONC: 15 min flushing time was a study assumption, is that a correct assumption, use Johnna's slides of lockage sequencing, how much buy back can we realize in times savings, total transit time, need the baseline to measure, what does this mean for the next boat up if stacked up at Lockport or downstream, how does it relate to the LPMS data over a period of time, negligible, slight, large impact?  do queuing for barges to mitigate time, are we designing to time deck hand has to walk to front of boat?  What are specific design parameters we are looking to address?
PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT: Need baseline information to establish what impacts or differences the project will have
PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY: Collect AISP or time stamped interval tracking of vessels to establish a baseline so that we can then determine our impacts.
ACTION_ITEMS: Finish AIS

CONCERNS: Concern that bubbles could effect maneuverability of barges and it doesn't remove the fish, have not determined best layout pattern which would effect future work,  don't have design parameters, taking concept to implementation, never been done before, how does this interact with other technologies
PDT_DISC_CONC: research scheduled for FY22, provide best design we can now but may need to modify, What kind of flexibility can be designed in the feature to allow for adaptive management? Define design parimeters.
PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT: will impact schedule of design, air bubble curtain is in Risk Increment I
PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY: Continue R&D, Peoria lock demo Fall/Winter FY22, test barge maneuverability transiting air bubble curtain/field. Defer testing and go to full design implementation at Brandon Road to execute the testing.
